nodes.id: 中正国防干部预备学校

zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校
en: Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School

description.zh-cn: 位于中华民国高雄市凤山区，是台湾唯一一所高级中等军事学校，隶属于中华民国国防部。该校为完全中学，设有高级部与初级部。
description.en: Located in Fengshan District, Kaohsiung, Republic of China, it is the only senior secondary military school in Taiwan and is subordinate to the Ministry of National Defense. The school is a comprehensive middle school with both senior and junior high school divisions.

en: Ministry of National Defense (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国防事务主管机关，管辖中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: The defense affairs authority of the Republic of China, which has jurisdiction over the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及军事将领，曾任行政院院长，任内指示将三所军事预备学校合并为中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China who served as Premier of the Executive Yuan. During his tenure, he directed the merger of three military preparatory schools into the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校预备学生班
中华民国陆军军官学校预备班

description.zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校的前身之一，原为中华民国陆军军官学校的预备班。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, originally the preparatory class for the R.O.C. Military Academy.

nodes.id: 海军军官学校预备学生班

zh-cn: 海军军官学校预备学生班

description.zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校的前身之一，原为中华民国海军军官学校的预备班。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, originally the preparatory class for the R.O.C. Naval Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校的前身之一，旨在为中华民国空军官校培养生源。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, aimed at cultivating students for the R.O.C. Air Force Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及军事将领，中正国防干部预备学校以其名字“中正”命名。
description.en: A political and military leader of the Republic of China, after whom the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School is named.

nodes.id: 中正预校奶茶斗殴事件

zh-cn: 中正预校奶茶斗殴事件

description.zh-cn: 2018年发生于中正国防干部预备学校的学生斗殴事件，因一杯奶茶引发，最终导致一名学生死亡。
description.en: A student brawl that occurred at Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School in 2018, triggered by a cup of milk tea, which ultimately resulted in the death of one student.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军二级上将，曾任参谋总长。在2018年中正预校奶茶斗殴事件发生后，曾率员到校调查。
description.en: An Admiral of the Republic of China Navy and former Chief of the General Staff. He led an investigation at Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School following the 2018 milk tea brawl incident.

en: Chief of the General Staff (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部参谋本部之首长，为中华民国国军的最高军职。
description.en: The head of the General Staff Headquarters of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China, the highest military position in the R.O.C. Armed Forces.

nodes.id: 中正预校高层行为失当事件

zh-cn: 中正预校高层行为失当事件

description.zh-cn: 2018年10月，中正预校的校长、教育长、政战主任被指控在餐会上行为失当，并违反留守规定，后被国防部调查并调职。
description.en: In October 2018, the principal, director of academic affairs, and director of political warfare at Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School were accused of misconduct at a banquet and violating duty regulations. They were subsequently investigated and transferred by the Ministry of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中四期校友，曾任该校第14任校长，后因高层行为失当事件被调职。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the 4th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School. He served as the 14th principal of the school and was later transferred due to the senior management misconduct incident.

nodes.id: 中正预校113年班重修补考争议

zh-cn: 中正预校113年班重修补考争议

description.zh-cn: 2022年，中正预校高中部113年班部分不合格学生，在立法委员介入后获得二次重修补考机会，引发公平性争议。
description.en: In 2022, some failing students from the 113th class of the senior high school division of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School were given a second chance for re-examination after a legislator's intervention, sparking a controversy over fairness.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、立法委员。被指介入中正预校113年班重修补考事宜。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and legislator. She was accused of intervening in the re-examination process for the 113th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第一任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the first principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第二任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the second principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第三任校长。任内对学校营舍和部队编制进行了改革。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the third principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School. During his tenure, he reformed the school's barracks and unit organization.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第四任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the fourth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第五任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the fifth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第六任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the sixth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第七任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the seventh principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第八任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the eighth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第九任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the ninth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校第十任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and the tenth principal of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中二期校友，后担任该校第十一任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 2nd class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's eleventh principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中三期校友，后担任该校第十二任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 3rd class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's twelfth principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中八期校友，后担任该校第十三任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 8th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's thirteenth principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中八期校友，后担任该校第十五任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 8th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's fifteenth principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中十期校友，后担任该校第十六任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 10th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's sixteenth principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中十一期校友，后担任该校第十七任校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 11th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, who later served as the school's seventeenth principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校中十三期校友，现任该校校长。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army, an alumnus of the 13th class of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School, currently serving as the school's principal.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军二级上将，中正国防干部预备学校68年班（中一期）校友。
description.en: A General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the class of 1979 (1st class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国空军二级上将，中正国防干部预备学校68年班（中一期）校友。
description.en: A General of the R.O.C. Air Force and an alumnus of the class of 1979 (1st class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 台湾检察官，中正国防干部预备学校68年班（中一期）校友。
description.en: A Taiwanese prosecutor and an alumnus of the class of 1979 (1st class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军二级上将，中正国防干部预备学校69年班（中二期）校友。
description.en: An Admiral of the R.O.C. Navy and an alumnus of the class of 1980 (2nd class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，中正国防干部预备学校69年班（中二期）校友。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the class of 1980 (2nd class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军二级上将，中正国防干部预备学校70年班（中三期）校友。
description.en: An Admiral of the R.O.C. Navy and an alumnus of the class of 1981 (3rd class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国空军二级上将，中正国防干部预备学校70年班（中三期）校友。
description.en: A General of the R.O.C. Air Force and an alumnus of the class of 1981 (3rd class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，中正国防干部预备学校72年班（中五期）校友。
description.en: A Lieutenant General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the class of 1983 (5th class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 台湾知名艺人，中正国防干部预备学校72年班（中五期）校友。
description.en: A well-known Taiwanese artist and an alumnus of the class of 1983 (5th class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 台湾知名艺人，中正国防干部预备学校校友。
description.en: A well-known Taiwanese artist and an alumnus of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 台湾知名艺人，中正国防干部预备学校74年班（中七期）校友。
description.en: A well-known Taiwanese artist and an alumnus of the class of 1985 (7th class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军少将，中正国防干部预备学校75年班（中八期）校友。
description.en: A Major General of the R.O.C. Army and an alumnus of the class of 1986 (8th class) of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

nodes.id: 中华民国陆军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军的军官学校，是中正国防干部预备学校毕业生的主要升学管道之一。
description.en: A military academy of the R.O.C. Armed Forces, and one of the main further education pathways for graduates of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

nodes.id: 中华民国海军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国海军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军的军官学校，是中正国防干部预备学校毕业生的主要升学管道之一。
description.en: A military academy of the R.O.C. Armed Forces, and one of the main further education pathways for graduates of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

nodes.id: 中华民国空军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国空军军官学校
en: Republic of China Air Force Academy

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军的军官学校，是中正国防干部预备学校毕业生的主要升学管道之一。
description.en: A military academy of the R.O.C. Armed Forces, and one of the main further education pathways for graduates of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

nodes.id: 国防大学政治作战学院

zh-cn: 国防大学政治作战学院
en: Political Warfare College, National Defense University

description.zh-cn: 原为政治作战学校，是中正国防干部预备学校毕业生的主要升学管道之一。
description.en: Formerly the Political Warfare School, it is one of the main further education pathways for graduates of Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

relationships.source: 中正国防干部预备学校
relationships.target: 中华民国国防部

description.zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校隶属于中华民国国防部。
description.en: The Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School is subordinate to the Ministry of National Defense.

relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 1975年，时任行政院院长蒋经国指示将陆军、海军、空军三所预备学校合并为中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: In 1975, then Premier Chiang Ching-kuo directed the merger of the Army, Navy, and Air Force preparatory schools into the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School.

relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 陆军军官预备学校于1976年被合并入新成立的中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: The Army Officers Preparatory School was merged into the newly established Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School in 1976.

relationships.source: 海军军官学校预备学生班
relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 海军军官学校预备学生班于1976年被合并入新成立的中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: The Naval Academy Preparatory Student Class was merged into the newly established Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School in 1976.

relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 空军幼年学校于1978年并入中正国防干部预备学校。
description.en: The Air Force Juvenile School was merged into the Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School in 1978.

relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 中正国防干部预备学校以蒋中正的名字“中正”命名，其校歌也提及要实践其遗训。
description.en: The Chung Cheng Armed Forces Preparatory School is named after Chiang Kai-shek ('Chung Cheng'), and its school anthem mentions the need to practice his last testament.

relationships.target: 中正预校奶茶斗殴事件

description.zh-cn: 在事件发生后，时任参谋总长李喜明率员到校进行调查。
description.en: After the incident, then Chief of the General Staff Lee Hsi-ming led a team to the school to conduct an investigation.

relationships.target: 中华民国参谋总长

description.zh-cn: 李喜明于2018年调查奶茶斗殴事件时担任参谋总长。
description.en: Lee Hsi-ming was the Chief of the General Staff in 2018 when he investigated the milk tea brawl incident.

relationships.source: 中正预校高层行为失当事件
relationships.target: 陈嘉生

description.zh-cn: 因高层行为失当事件，时任校长陈嘉生被国防部调查并调离现职。
description.en: Due to the senior management misconduct incident, then-principal Chen Chia-sheng was investigated by the Ministry of National Defense and removed from his post.

relationships.target: 中正预校113年班重修补考争议

description.zh-cn: 据指控，立法委员赖品妤向校方施压，促使校方为成绩不合格学生举行二次重修补考，从而引发争议。
description.en: According to allegations, Legislator Lai Pin-yu pressured the school to hold a second round of re-examinations for failing students, which sparked the controversy.

relationships.target: 中正国防干部预备学校

description.zh-cn: 于1981年7月接任校长后，对学校的营舍分配和部队番号进行了改革。
description.en: After assuming the presidency in July 1981, he reformed the school's barracks allocation and unit designations.
